entry.title: Random selfies
entry.content: [[carousel:label=Gobbo photo set; media/images/goofy-gobbo.avif|Not the most flattering but maybe the most me; media/images/frizzy-gobbo.avif|Shortly after Collin styled my hair, idk what I did to fuck it up; media/images/gamer-gobbo.avif|Farming 🐮; media/images/gobbo-splits.avif|Still trying!; media/images/goth-gobbo.avif|I crashed out before actually being able to party with Catgirl 😭 Still so sad about this; media/images/normal-gobbo.avif|😈]] 6 images
